item.title: Nate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Always acknowledge a fault. This will throw those in authority off their guard and give you an opportunity to commit more." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nate add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "A person that started in to carry a cat home by the tail was gitting knowledge that was always going to be useful to him, and warn't ever going to grow dim or doubtful." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nate add a quote by Abraham Maslow
item.description: "I suppose it is tempting, if the only tool you have is a hammer, to treat everything as if it were a nail." -- Abraham Maslow

item.title: Nate add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Every gathering has its moment. As an adult, I distract myself by trying to identify it, dreading the inevitable downswing that is sure to follow. The guests will repeat themselves one too many times, or you'll run out of dope or liquor and realize that it was all you ever had in common." -- David Sedaris
